channel.title: Favorite videogame player?
channel.description:
Hey everyone i just wanted to make a cool little poll for all the video gamers out there, i personally like the nintendo wii because i haven't tried the x box 360 because the games are to expensive (60$) and i haven't tried ps3 because it's not out yet and if it is then i havent saw it yet enjoy everyone!
[glow=red,2,300]:*:+:Please leave post:-:+:[/glow][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 10:44:17 PM[/size][hr]i started off, and voted for the wii, because i have the nintendo wii, and some good games like red steel and the rest are in my siggy..

item.title: Favorite videogame player?
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

Of course,I say all of the above.Video games rock-but I don’t just play em like a hobo-I do study and get good grades.

BTW PS3 is out.People were literally CAMPING at sony stores to buy it.A guy between the age of 30-90 was shot-he didnt die and only needed to saty in the hospital for a month.He was shot because he didn’t wana hand over his mkney to teenagers.
